Title: eps2.6_succ3ss0r.p12
Writer: Sam Esmail (created by), Courtney Looney, Adam Penn (story editor), Randolph Leon (story editor)
Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday, Michael Cristofer
Plot: The latest fsociety leak has Dom trying her best to spin the case in the FBI's favor; Angela defends her career choices; Darlene makes it known that her circle of trust is shrinking.
